Sentencas: Electrostatic spray pyrolysis (ESP), or electrospraying, a rather novel technique to generate aerosols, has been used for thin film deposition of oxidic ceramic materials.
Titulo: LOW-TEMPERATURE SYNTHESIS OF THIN-FILMS OF YSZ AND BACEO(3) USING ELECTROSTATIC SPRAY-PYROLYSIS (ESP)

Sentencas: Yttrium stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and barium cerate (BaCeO3), which are utilized as solid electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), are synthesized using electrospraying.
Titulo: LOW-TEMPERATURE SYNTHESIS OF THIN-FILMS OF YSZ AND BACEO(3) USING ELECTROSTATIC SPRAY-PYROLYSIS (ESP)

Sentencas: YSZ can be obtained directly after spraying, whereas BaCeO3 needs to be annealed.
Titulo: LOW-TEMPERATURE SYNTHESIS OF THIN-FILMS OF YSZ AND BACEO(3) USING ELECTROSTATIC SPRAY-PYROLYSIS (ESP)
